steps.sql: select distinct eqi.customerid from mysql_hxdb_employee_quota_info eqi,mysql_hxdb_employee_company_record ec where eqi.certid=ec.certid  and ec.newsjtname in ('A','BD','C','E','FG','H','J','K','L','S','CAA','B','D')

select count(*) as zfb_register_amount,sum(case when ba.approvestatus='03' then 1 end) as zfb_approved_amount ,#{biz_date} as biz_date, #{begin_time} as begin_time, #{end_time} as end_time from mysql_hxdb_business_apply ba,t where ba.customerid=t.customerid and ba.businesstype='6'
